description.x-y:
The user disperses electrically charged
particles, which changes Normal-type
moves to Electric-type moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user disperses electrically charged
particles, which changes Normal-type
moves to Electric-type moves.

The user disperses electrically charged particles,
which changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Changes all Pokémon's normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
effect.shortEffect: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
